subject: Compatibility Question
description_text:
Hello.
Im considering purchasing these items Simonn pedal haptics. I did have a
question. I use logtiech g923  pedals. My question is can I use these with
logitech pedals. Im aware that I have to purchase a control box. My
question is do I have to use a third party mount to mount the haptics to
the pedal. And does it work if the pedals are inverted

conversations.body_text: Hi Reese Leatherwood,    Inversion is fine and will not cause any problems. However, the mounting bracket we provide may not be compatible with your pedals, so you may need to purchase an additional mounting bracket separately.
